name: Dingo Web IDE
short_description:
This project is in planning phase..

Build Jabiru Server Pages or Olingo Server Pages  with Dingo Web IDE.

Dingo Web IDE is an Pascal Rad IDE for the web bundled with Apache Tomcat Server and Apache Webserver and Squid SQL Server. You can build high quaility Jsp.JET(Jabiru Server Pages) or Osp.JET(Olingo Server Pages)websites with Ajax Technology using the visual gui designer inside Web IDE for drawing widgets and components on forms and then write code in the Dingo Pascal Language. Users can either choose the Apache Webserver + The Squid SQL Server to build and run Osp.JET web applications or choose the Apache Tomcat Server + The Squid SQL Server to build and run Jsp.JET pages.

more info about this project coming soon..
summary: An Visual Web IDE for the Dingo Pascal Language
